Posts.Content: I know this is too late foryou, but others may be helped.  I used women's self adhesive sanitary pads to pads the bottom of my bra during the day.  This helped cushion my breast from the skin under it.  Stick the pad to the bottom of your bra with the soft side touching your skin.  Is helping me; hope it helps others. And, Judy M., I hope your trials are successfully over!
